ML_TI_DOC.TI_TEXT: Offentligt udbud med opfordring til afgivelse af bud i en offentlig international udbudsprocedure for indkøb af arbejder i forbindelse med byggeri, genopbygning, opgradering og renovering af kollegier til studerende og universiteter inden for projektet »Education for Social Inclusion« – CEB F/P 1746 (2011)

Öffentliche Aufforderung zur Angebotsabgabe im offenen internationalen Verfahren für Arbeiten, die die Konstruktion, Rekonstruktion, Aufwertung und Renovierung von Studentenwohnheimen innerhalb des Projekts „Education for Social Inclusion“ - CEB F/P 1746 (2011) betreffen.

Public invitation for submitting bids in open international procedure for procurement of works related to the construction, reconstruction, upgrading and renovation works of student and university dormitories within Project “Education for Social Inclusion” – CEB F/P 1746 (2011)

Invitación pública a la presentación de ofertas en un procedimiento abierto internacional para la contratación de obras relacionadas con la construcción, reconstrucción, mejora y renovación de residencias universitarias y de estudiantes en el marco del proyecto «Educación para la inclusión social» – CEB F/P 1746 (2011)

Julkinen kutsu avoimen kansainvälisen hankintamenettelyn puitteissa opiskelija- ja yliopistoasuntoloiden rakennus-, uusimis-, parannus- ja kunnostustöihin liittyvien urakkatarjousten tekemiseksi sosiaalista osallistamista edistävää koulutusta koskevan hankkeen (CEB F/P 1746 (2011)) yhteydessä

Invitation publique à la soumission d'offres dans la procédure internationale ouverte de fourniture de travaux de construction, de reconstruction, d'amélioration et de rénovation de dortoirs destinés aux étudiants et aux universitaires dans le cadre du projet « Éducation pour l’insertion sociale » CEB F/P 1746 (2011)

Δημόσια πρόσκληση υποβολής προσφορών σε ανοικτή διεθνή διαδικασία για σύμβαση έργου σχετικά με την κατασκευή, ανακατασκευή, αναβάθμιση και ανακαίνιση φοιτητικών και πανεπιστημιακών κοιτώνων στο πλαίσιο του Προγράμματος «Εκπαίδευση για την Κοινωνική Ένταξη» - CEB F / P 1746 (2011)

Invito pubblico a presentare offerte in una procedura internazionale aperta per l'acquisizione di opere inerenti a lavori di costruzione, ricostruzione, ristrutturazione e ammodernamento di dormitori per studenti e universitari nell'ambito del progetto "Education for Social Inclusion" (Istruzione per l'inclusione sociale) – CEB F/P 1746 (2011)

Openbare uitnodiging voor het indienen van voorstellen voor een openbare internationale procedure voor de aanbesteding van werken die verband houden met de bouw, wederopbouw, modernisering en renovatie van studentenhuizen in het kader van het project „Onderwijs voor sociale inclusie” – CEB F/P 1746 (2011)

Convite público para apresentação de propostas num concurso público internacional para fornecimento de obras referentes à construção, reconstrução, atualização e renovação de dormitórios de estudantes e universitários no âmbito do Projeto «Educação para Inclusão Social» – CEB F/P 1746 (2011)

Offentlig inbjudan för inlämning av anbud i ett öppet internationellt förfarande avseende upphandling av byggentreprenad med anknytning till anläggning, återuppbyggnad, uppgradering och renovering av student- och universitetsbostäder inom projektet "utbildning för social integration" - CEB F/P 1746 (2011)

Veřejná výzva k podání nabídek v otevřeném mezinárodním řízení za účelem zajištění prací týkajících se výstavby, rekonstrukce, modernizace a renovace studentských a univerzitních kolejí v rámci projektu „Vzdělávání pro sociální začleňování“ – CEB F/P 1746 (2011)

Avalik kutse pakkumiste esitamiseks projekti „Haridus sotsiaalne kaasatuse nimel“ – CEB F/P 1746 (2011) raames üliõpilaste ja ülikooli ühiselamute ehitamise, rekonstrueerimise, remondi ja renoveerimise tööde rahvusvahelises avatud hankemenetluses

Nyílt ajánlattételi felhívás az „Oktatás a társadalmi befogadásért“ című projektben részt vevő tanulói és egyetemi kollégiumok építéséhez, újjáépítéséhez, fejlesztéséhez és felújítási munkálataihoz kapcsolódó munkák biztosítására irányuló nemzetközi közbeszerzési eljárásra vonatkozóan – CEB F/P 1746 (2011)

Viešas kvietimas teikti pasiūlymus atvirame tarptautiniame konkurse dėl darbų, susijusių su studentų ir universitetų bendrabučių statyba, rekonstrukcija, modernizavimu ir atnaujinimu, pirkimo vykdant projektą „Švietimas socialinei įtraukčiai“ CEB F/P 1746 (2011 m.)

Publisks uzaicinājums iesniegt piedāvājumus starptautiskai iepirkuma procedūrai par būvniecības, rekonstrukcijas, uzlabošanas un atjaunošanas darbiem studentu un universitāšu kopmītnēs projekta “Izglītība sociālās iekļaušanas veicināšanai” ietvaros – CEB F/P 1746 (2011)

Stedina pubblika għat-tfigħ ta' offerti fi proċedura internazzjonali miftuħa għall-ksib ta' xogħlijiet relatati max-xogħlijiet ta' kostruzzjoni, kostruzzjoni mill-ġdid, appgrejdjar u rinnovazzjoni ta' dormitorji tal-istudenti u tal-universitajiet fi ħdan il-Proġett "Edukazzjoni għall-Inklużjoni Soċjali" – CEB F/P 1746 (2011)

Zaproszenie otwarte do składania ofert w otwartej procedurze międzynarodowej w celu realizacji robót związanych z budową, przebudową, modernizacją i remontowaniem akademików uniwersyteckich w ramach projektu „Edukacja na rzecz włączenia społecznego” – CEB F/P 1746 (2011)

Verejná výzva na predkladanie ponúk vo verejnom medzinárodnom konaní na obstarávanie prác súvisiacich s výstavbou, rekonštrukciou, modernizáciou a renováciou študentských a vysokoškolských ubytovacích zariadení v rámci projektu „Vzdelávanie v záujme sociálneho začlenenia“ – CEB F/P 1746 (2011)

Javno vabilo k oddaji ponudb v odprtem mednarodnem postopku za naročilo del, povezanih z gradnjo, obnovo, nadgradnjo in prenovo študentskih in univerzitetnih domov v okviru projekta „Izobraževanje za socialno vključevanje“ – CEB F/P 1746 (2011)

Cuireadh don phobal chun tairiscintí a chur isteach i nós imeachta oscailte idirnáisiúnta le haghaidh soláthar oibreacha a bhaineann le hoibreacha tógála, atógála, uasghrádaithe agus athchóirithe suanliosanna mac léinn agus ollscoileanna laistigh den tionscadal “Oideachas ar mhaithe le Cuimsiú Sóisialta” – CEB F/P 1746 (2011)

Публична покана за подаване на оферти в открита международна процедура за доставка на услуги, свързани със строителството, реконструкцията, актуализацията и реновирането на студентски и университетски общежития в рамките на проекта „Образование и социално приобщаване“ — CEB F/P 1746 (2011)

Invitație publică pentru depunerea ofertelor în cadrul procedurii internaționale deschise pentru achiziționarea de lucrări referitoare la construcția, reconstrucția, modernizarea și renovarea căminelor studențești și universitare în cadrul proiectului "Educație pentru incluziune socială" - CEB F / P 1746 (2011)

Javni poziv za podnošenje ponuda u otvorenom međunarodnom postupku za nabavu radova povezanih s izgradnjom, rekonstrukcijom, nadogradnjom i renoviranjem studentskih i sveučilišnih domova unutar Projekta „Obrazovanje za socijalnu uključenost“ - CEB F/P 1746 (2011)

TI_DOC.P: RS-Beograd: Offentligt udbud med opfordring til afgivelse af bud i en offentlig international udbudsprocedure for indkøb af arbejder i forbindelse med byggeri, genopbygning, opgradering og renovering af kollegier til studerende og universiteter inden for projektet »Education for Social Inclusion« – CEB F/P 1746 (2011)

CONTENTS.P: The Ministry of Education, Science and Technological Development, of the Republic of Serbia (hereinafter referred to as “The Borrower”) is financing procurement of works from a loan received from the Council of Europe Development Bank (CEB) - F/P 1746 (2011), concluded on 16 February 2012, for the realization of the Project: “Education for Social Inclusion”, from which is going to be financed procurement of works under this contract.

The objective of this contract is construction, reconstruction, upgrading and renovation of student and university dormitories in six locations: Kragujevac, Palic, Pozarevac, Sabac, Subotica i Sjenica. In order to improve the living condition of the students in dormitories, the facilities will be constructed, reconstructed, upgraded or renovated.
This public procurement is divided into 6 (six) lots:
Lot 1 – UD Kragujevac
Lot 2 – SR Palic (facilities 3, 4, 5_5a, 6.1 and 6.2)
Lot 3 – SD Pozarevac
Lot 4 – SD Sabac
Lot 5 – UD Subotica
Lot 6 – UD Sjenica
The foreseen construction period will be as follow:
Lot 1: 450 days
Lot 2: 360 days
Lot 3: 270 days
Lot 4: 270 days
Lot 5: 360 days
Lot 6: 450 days
The works will be implemented as per FIDIC Harmonized Construction Contract General Conditions.

Public procurement will be conducted through the open international bidding procedures specified in the CEB Guidelines for Procurement of supply, works and services, version September 2011, as specified under the Framework Loan Agreement F/P 1764 (2011).
The Commencement of the works is expected to be in the second quarter of 2018.
The criterion to be used for awarding the contract is the lowest price of the compliant and technically responsive bid.
Interested Bidders may request additional information at the latest on 21 February 2018, at the following address from 10:00 to 12:00 Central European Time every working day:
Ministry of Education, Science and Technological Development
No 22-26 Nemanjina Street,
Floor/ Number of office: VI floor, office No 15
11000 Belgrade, Serbia
Contact person is Mr Branislav Cvejic
E-mail: ceb@mpn.gov.rs
A complete set of Tender Documents may be obtained after the submission of an application to the above-written address bearing the name of the project and referent number of tender procedure.

On the request, the Tender Documents may be sent by courier service if the transport is previously provided by the Bidder in his country. The Borrower bears no responsibility for the delivery in such a case.
A Bid Security for:
Fulfilling the conditions indicated in the Bidding Documents must accompany all bids.

A pre-Bid meeting and site visits are mandatory. Only authorized representatives of the bidders who requested Tender documentation will be able to attend the pre-Bid meeting and site visits. The Certificates of attendance will be issued at the end of the pre-Bid meeting and site visits.
Bidders will need to register for the pre-Bid meeting and site visits at the latest on 26 January 2018 until 12:00 o'clock Central European Time by an email: ceb@mpn.gov.rs

The pre-Bid meeting will be held on 1 February 2018 at 10.00 o'clock Central European Time, at Ministry of Education, Science and Technological Development, No 22-26 (VI floor, office No 15) Nemanjina Street, 11000 Belgrade, Serbia.
The minutes of the pre-Bid meeting will be sent to all the bidders.
Site visits will take place as follow:
For LOT 1 – in the period from 5 February 2018 to 6 February 2018 from 9:00 o'clock to 14:00 o'clock Central European Time, UD Kragujevac, Vojvode Putnika street no 53, Kragujevac, Serbia
For LOT 2 – in the period from 7 February 2018 to 8 February 2018 from 9:00 o'clock to 14:00 o'clock Central European Time, SR Palic, Kanjiški put street no.27, Palic, Serbia
For LOT 3 – in the period from 9 February 2018 to 10 February 2018 from 9:00 o'clock to 14:00 o'clock Central European Time, SD Pozarevac, Koste Stamenković street, Pozarevac, Serbia
For LOT 4 – in the period from 12 February 2018 to 13 February 2018 from 9:00 o'clock to 14:00 o'clock Central European Time, SD Sabac, Vojvode Putnika street no. 58, Sabac, Serbia
For LOT 5 – in the period from 14 February 2018 to 15 February 2018 from 9:00 o'clock to 14:00 o'clock Central European Time, UD Subotica, Ferenca Sepa street no 5, Subotica, Serbia
For LOT 6 – in the period from 6 February 2018 to 17 February 2018 from 9:00 o'clock to 14:00 o'clock Central European Time, UD Sjenica, Lenjinova street, Sjenica, Serbia

All bids must be delivered in a closed envelope bearing the mention “Bid for Execution of Works related to the Construction, reconstruction, upgrading and renovation works of student and university dormitories” No: RSMF-F/P 1746 (2011)-W-ICB-01/2017/MoESTD with the indicated name and number of the LOT for which the offer is submitted.
Not later than 13 March 2018 until 12:00 o’clock Central European Time at the following address:
Ministry of Education, Science and Technological Development,
No 22-26 Nemanjina Street,
Floor/ Number of office: VI floor, office No 15
11000 Belgrade, Serbia.
Bids will be opened on 13 March 2018 at 12:30 o’clock Central European Time in the presence of Bidders’ representatives who choose to attend, at the following address:

ADDRESS_NOT_STRUCT.ORGANISATION: Ministry of Education, Science and Technological Development
ADDRESS_NOT_STRUCT.BLK_BTX: , No 22-26 Nemanjina Street, Floor/ Number of office: VI floor, office No 15, 11000
, Serbia

TI_DOC.P: RS-Belgrado: Convite público para apresentação de propostas num concurso público internacional para fornecimento de obras referentes à construção, reconstrução, atualização e renovação de dormitórios de estudantes e universitários no âmbito do Projeto «Educação para Inclusão Social» – CEB F/P 1746 (2011)

CONTENTS.P: The Ministry of Education, Science and Technological Development, of the Republic of Serbia (hereinafter referred to as “The Borrower”) is financing procurement of works from a loan received from the Council of Europe Development Bank (CEB) - F/P 1746 (2011), concluded on 16 February 2012, for the realization of the Project: “Education for Social Inclusion”, from which is going to be financed procurement of works under this contract.

The objective of this contract is construction, reconstruction, upgrading and renovation of student and university dormitories in six locations: Kragujevac, Palic, Pozarevac, Sabac, Subotica i Sjenica. In order to improve the living condition of the students in dormitories, the facilities will be constructed, reconstructed, upgraded or renovated.

Lot 2 – SR Palic (facilities 3, 4, 5_5a, 6.1 and 6.2)
Lot 3 – SD Pozarevac

Lot 6 – UD Sjenica
The foreseen construction period will be as follow:
Lot 1: 450 days
Lot 2: 360 days
Lot 3: 270 days
Lot 4: 270 days
Lot 5: 360 days
Lot 6: 450 days
The works will be implemented as per FIDIC Harmonized Construction Contract General Conditions.

Public procurement will be conducted through the open international bidding procedures specified in the CEB Guidelines for Procurement of supply, works and services, version September 2011, as specified under the Framework Loan Agreement F/P 1764 (2011).
The Commencement of the works is expected to be in the second quarter of 2018.
The criterion to be used for awarding the contract is the lowest price of the compliant and technically responsive bid.

CONTENTS.P: The Ministry of Education, Science and Technological Development, of the Republic of Serbia (hereinafter referred to as “The Borrower”) is financing procurement of works from a loan received from the Council of Europe Development Bank (CEB) - F/P 1746 (2011), concluded on 16 February 2012, for the realization of the Project: “Education for Social Inclusion”, from which is going to be financed procurement of works under this contract.

The objective of this contract is construction, reconstruction, upgrading and renovation of student and university dormitories in six locations: Kragujevac, Palic, Pozarevac, Sabac, Subotica i Sjenica. In order to improve the living condition of the students in dormitories, the facilities will be constructed, reconstructed, upgraded or renovated.
This public procurement is divided into 6 (six) lots:
Lot 1 – UD Kragujevac
Lot 2 – SR Palic (facilities 3, 4, 5_5a, 6.1 and 6.2)
Lot 3 – SD Pozarevac
Lot 4 – SD Sabac
Lot 5 – UD Subotica
Lot 6 – UD Sjenica
The foreseen construction period will be as follow:
Lot 1: 450 days
Lot 2: 360 days
Lot 3: 270 days
Lot 4: 270 days
Lot 5: 360 days
Lot 6: 450 days
The works will be implemented as per FIDIC Harmonized Construction Contract General Conditions.

Public procurement will be conducted through the open international bidding procedures specified in the CEB Guidelines for Procurement of supply, works and services, version September 2011, as specified under the Framework Loan Agreement F/P 1764 (2011).
The Commencement of the works is expected to be in the second quarter of 2018.
The criterion to be used for awarding the contract is the lowest price of the compliant and technically responsive bid.

CONTENTS.P: The Ministry of Education, Science and Technological Development, of the Republic of Serbia (hereinafter referred to as “The Borrower”) is financing procurement of works from a loan received from the Council of Europe Development Bank (CEB) - F/P 1746 (2011), concluded on 16 February 2012, for the realization of the Project: “Education for Social Inclusion”, from which is going to be financed procurement of works under this contract.

The objective of this contract is construction, reconstruction, upgrading and renovation of student and university dormitories in six locations: Kragujevac, Palic, Pozarevac, Sabac, Subotica i Sjenica. In order to improve the living condition of the students in dormitories, the facilities will be constructed, reconstructed, upgraded or renovated.
This public procurement is divided into 6 (six) lots:

Lot 2 – SR Palic (facilities 3, 4, 5_5a, 6.1 and 6.2)

Lot 2: 360 days
Lot 3: 270 days
Lot 4: 270 days
Lot 5: 360 days
Lot 6: 450 days
The works will be implemented as per FIDIC Harmonized Construction Contract General Conditions.

Public procurement will be conducted through the open international bidding procedures specified in the CEB Guidelines for Procurement of supply, works and services, version September 2011, as specified under the Framework Loan Agreement F/P 1764 (2011).
The Commencement of the works is expected to be in the second quarter of 2018.
The criterion to be used for awarding the contract is the lowest price of the compliant and technically responsive bid.

The pre-Bid meeting will be held on 1 February 2018 at 10.00 o'clock Central European Time, at Ministry of Education, Science and Technological Development, No 22-26 (VI floor, office No 15) Nemanjina Street, 11000 Belgrade, Serbia.
The minutes of the pre-Bid meeting will be sent to all the bidders.
